title: General Trading
description: Test your general trading knowledge with this flashcard quiz.

cards.question: The Dollar Index is represented by which?
cards.explanation: The Dollar Index, is commonly known as DXY or USDX, and is used as a measurement of strength of the US Dollar.

cards.question: Which of the following is valued 10x less than the other?
cards.explanation: SPX is short for the S&P 500. SPY holds a portfolio of stocks included in the S&P 500 and aims to produce returns roughly in line with the S&P, at about 10% of the index price.

cards.question: What is the most liquid market?
cards.explanation: Forex is by far the most liquid market out of these options at 5.3 Trillion Dollars in daily Volume compared to $436bn for Futures, $191bn for Equities and $15bn for Crypto.
